name: Chorus
description: A Discord bot that allows for collective tweeting through reactions.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: Your Twitter access token key. Requires read and write permissions.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Twitter access token secret. Requires read and write permissions.

DISCORD_CHANNELS.description: The Discord channels to listen to for reactions on messages. Add more than one channel by separating them with a comma.

TWEET_REACTION_EMOJI.description: Reaction emoji for sending message as a tweet.

TWEET_REACTION_THRESHOLD.description: Reaction threshold for sending a message as a tweet.

TWEET_SUCCESS.description: Reaction emoji for tweets that have been sent successfully.

TWEET_ERROR.description: Reaction emoji for tweets that have encountered an error.
